snippet: Rockets fired by Houthi rebels killed 43 people in Aden, and an airstrike by the Saudi-led military coalition killed 24 people in Yemen’s Ibb district, officials said.
abstract: Houthi rebel fighters fire rockets into city of Aden, Yemen, killing at least 43 people; attack comes two days after Yemeni government declares city liberated from Houthis.

byline.contributor: Shuaib Almosawa contributed reporting from Sana, and Kareem Fahim from Cairo.

lead_paragraph: Rockets fired by Houthi rebels killed 43 people in Aden, and an airstrike by the Saudi-led military coalition killed 24 people in Yemen’s Ibb district, officials said.

headline.main: Dozens of Civilians Killed by Rockets and Airstrikes in Yemen
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Yemen: Rockets Kill Dozens of Civilians
